医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究通过先进的功能磁共振成像技术揭示了动态大脑结构......来自西班牙国家研究委员会 (CSIC) 和埃尔切米格尔·埃尔南德斯大学 (UMH) 联合中心神经科学研究所 (IN) 的研究人员与特兰西瓦尼亚神经科学研究所（罗马尼亚）的一个团队合作，与瓦伦西亚理工大学的专家合作，开发了一种利用功能磁共振成像 (fMRI) 研究大脑连接的创新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-unveils-dynamic-brain-architecture-through-advanced-fMRI-techniques-Neuroscientists-In-Spain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-unveils-dynamic-brain-architecture-through-advanced-fMRI-techniques-Neuroscientists-In-Spain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=977effa3-f34d-4c7a-acfb-c31fd785ab87 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 10:11:26 -0400 Study unveils dynamic brain architecture through advanced fMRI techniques Neuroscientists In Spain ...
创伤暴露与女性大脑年龄加速和阿尔茨海默病风险有关随着人口中位年龄的增加，被诊断患有阿尔茨海默病的人数也在增加。随着技术的进步，确定大脑年龄和识别血液中的阿尔茨海默病生物标志物变得更加容易。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Trauma-exposure-linked-to-accelerated-brain-age-and-Alzheimers-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Trauma-exposure-linked-to-accelerated-brain-age-and-Alzheimers-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5d76332-38c5-43f1-87b3-cd59e1abfd54 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 10:06:39 -0400 Trauma exposure linked to accelerated brain age and Alzheimer's risk in women
创新方法释放了不可成药 GTP 酶的药物潜力针对 K-Ras 癌基因的药物激发了一种针对 GTP 酶的方法，GTP 酶是一种酶，其功能障碍可导致帕金森病和许多其他疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Innovative-method-unlocks-pottial-for-drugging-undruggable-GTPases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Innovative-method-unlocks-pottial-for-drugging-undruggable-GTPases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b26ed77-b39c-4e70-993d​​-679789a5f6b0 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 10:04:06 -0400 Innovative method unlocks potential for drugging undruggable GTPases
研究旨在利用新显像剂改善间质性肺疾病的预后埃克塞特大学和临床放射性制药公司 Serac Healthcare Ltd 的研究人员正在研究一种新的分子成像标记物，它可以帮助更快地检测疾病进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Research-aims-to-improve-interstitial-lung-disease-prognosis-with-new-imaging-agent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Research-aims-to-improve-interstitial-lung-disease-prognosis-with-new-imaging-agent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78148d95-1b47-4cba-a356-86bac69044f3 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 09:58:37 -0400 Research aims to improve interstitial lung disease prognosis with new imaging agent
担心最坏的情况，学校部署武装警察阻止枪支暴力2023 年 3 月，一名枪手在一所天主教高中和另一所天主教高中游荡的虚假警报引发了可怕的疏散，并引发了该市警方的强有力反应。这也促使教区重新思考模范学习环境的构成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Fearing-the-worst-schools-deploy-armed-police-to-thwart-gun-violence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Fearing-the-worst-schools-deploy-armed-police-to-thwart-gun-violence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f487965b-388a-4408-a811-4e8924677d53 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 09:52:02 -0400 Fearing the worst, schools deploy armed police to thwart gun violence
痴呆症患者产生自杀念头的风险可能更高伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，痴呆症患者更有可能有自杀念头，但不一定比普通人群更有可能尝试自杀或死于自杀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/People-with-dementia-may-be-at-higher-risk-of-having-suicidal-thoughts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/People-with-dementia-may-be-at-higher-risk-of-having-suicidal-thoughts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9d9a3ff-cf71-4dcf-84b6-63c004d02cf2 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 09:50:27 -0400 People with dementia may be at higher risk of having suicidal thoughts
热浪与癫痫患者癫痫发作增加有关伦敦大学学院临床科学家进行的一项新的小规模患者研究发现，热浪会加剧癫痫患者大脑的异常兴奋性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Heatwaves-linked-to-increased-seizures-in-epilepsy-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Heatwaves-linked-to-increased-seizures-in-epilepsy-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a940b43-75b7-4572-92ab-38044aaaa332 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 09:46:38 -0400 Heatwaves linked to increased seizures in epilepsy patients
C1QL1 蛋白被认为是髓磷脂替代的关键大脑的神经元受到称为髓磷脂的绝缘层的保护。在多发性硬化症等某些疾病中，这种保护层被破坏和丢失，导致神经元死亡和残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/C1QL1- Protein-identified-as-key-to-myelin-replacement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/C1QL1- Protein-identified-as-key-to-myelin-replacement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dffe6f3d-5c41-44ef-83a2-318d458ad2be Wed, 11 Sep 2024 09:41:48 -0400 C1QL1 protein identified as key to myelin replacement
喉咙问题与压力反射敏感性下降有关南安普顿大学领导的一项新研究显示，患有喉咙问题的患者调节血压的能力较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Throat-problems-linked-to-decreased-baroreflex-sensitivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Throat-problems-linked-to-decreased-baroreflex-sensitivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=820cb7ec-f886-4740-ae48-ab4f8f9990ed Wed, 11 Sep 2024 09:36:02 -0400 Throat problems linked to decreased baroreflex sensitivity
洛杉矶护理中心 (LA Care) 的长期负责人在经历重大 Medi-Cal 变革后退休近十年来，John Baackes 一直领导着 LA Care Health Plan，这是一家公立保险公司，主要为 Medi-Cal 的洛杉矶县低收入居民提供服务。这是该州迄今为止最大的 Medi-Cal 计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Longtime-head-of-LA-Care-to-retire-after-navigating-major-Medi-Cal-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Longtime-head-of-LA-Care-to-retire-after-navigating-major-Medi-Cal-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06e0c3c7-9847-47a6-85e6-883e75f9c497 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 09:31:56 -0400 Longtime head of L.A. Care to retire after navigating major Medi-Cal changes
